A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The humor was definitely more than the usual Star Wars\, but the audience I saw it with was eating it up. Mark Hamill really impressed me\, much more gravitas than I was expecting. I was much more satisfied with how he and Leia were handled in this chapter than how Han was handled in the last one. And it was cool seeing so many women in leadership roles in the Rebellion. I also really liked the new Asian girl\, she was a really fun addition. Overall\, I would say my favorite of all the SW films after Return of the Jedi and Empire Strikes Back\, and I will likely see in theaters again before it goes.
